Articles.Content: Hi Guys, me again.  Landed on Gilly to do some tests, all complete and cannot reboard the ship despite it showing me that I can grab the ladders and board when I've used my jetpack to get up to the capsule.  Tried saving and loading, swapping between ship and Astronaut.  Googled it but not much showing on this one??
You're getting the F and B prompts? What happens when you try them?
Yeah F & B are showing as options but not responding.  WSAD jump and jetpack all working.  Reloaded and tried again but as soon as I exit pod I can't get back in.
Sorted it, read somewhere to try and shut down the game and restart and its all good in the hood!!
I'm glad it worked, but I hope you won't have to do that every time.
